channel.title: How i get Mod Taharoks Ultimate Compiler?

item.title: How i get Mod Taharoks Ultimate Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

i was the first person to make an “ultimate compiler” and mod taharok made his after mine, and honestly all it is is something that will launch other programs with the same .bat file. if you want mine to get a basic idea of it, here:

CLS

@COLOR 0c
@Title WhoGivesAScape
@ECHO WhoGivesAScape
@ECHO By Staccia
@ECHO -!-!-
@ECHO Message Me With Any Questions
@ECHO Halla_Halla_Girl547@hotmail.com
@ECHO -!-!-
@ECHO Type Run Then Enter To RunServer.
@ECHO Type Compile Then Enter To Compile.
@ECHO Type Restart Then Enter To Restart Server.
@ECHO Type R+C Then Enter To Restart+Compile.
@ECHO Type Internet Then Enter To Run Internet Explorer.
@ECHO Type Ham Then Enter To Run Hamachi.
@ECHO Type Scar Then Enter To Run Scar
@ECHO Type Swift Then Enter To Run SwiftSwitch.
@ECHO Type Forums Then Enter To Run MoparScape Forums.
@ECHO Type Mopar Then Enter To Run MoparScape.
@ECHO Type Client Then Enter To Run Client
@ECHO Type Exit Then Enter To Exit.
@SET option=
@ECHO -!-!-
@ECHO off
SET /p option=What Do You Choose?
if %option%==run goto runclient
if %option%==compile goto compile
if %option%==restart goto restartserver
if %option%==r+c goto randc
if %option%==internet goto internet
if %option%==ham goto ham
if %option%==76767676 goto This is for if you want to add something to it
if %option%==swift goto swift
if %option%==forums goto forums
if %option%==exit goto exit
if %option%==scar goto scar
if %option%==mopar goto m
:compile
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
title Compile
“G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“G:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause
SET /p option= !-!-!Type 1 For Main Menu!-!-!
if %option%==1 goto start
CLS
goto info
:runclient
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
title RunClient
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:restartserver
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
tskill java /a
@echo off
title Restart
@echo Welcome To WhoGivesAScape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:randc
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
tskill java /a
@echo Exited Other RunServer, Now Compiling…
title Restart+Compile
“G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause
CLS
goto info
:internet
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Type Start To Go To Start Page When Finished!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
title INTERNET STARTER
@echo Starting Internet…
“G:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe”
SET /p option=Go Back To Start?
if %option%==start goto start
CLS
goto info
:ham
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!WhoGivesAScape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Please Comment!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!On My Coding!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!This Is My First!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile Post!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Type Start To Go To Start Page When Finished!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
title Hamachi Starter
@echo Starting Hamachi…
“G:\Program Files\Hamachi\Hamachi.exe”
SET /p option=Go Back To Start?
if %option%==start goto start
CLS
goto info
:swift
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------

@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!!-!-!

@echo -----------------------------------------

@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Ty to Jonyo For Internet!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Type Start To Go To Start Page When Finished!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !^(MADE BY STACCIA)^!
@echo off
COLOR 0c
title SwiftSwitch Starter
@echo Starting SwiftSwitch…
“G:\Program Files\SwiftSwitch\SwiftSwitch.exe”
SET /p option=Go Back To Start?
if %option%==start goto start
CLS
goto info
:forums
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------

@echo When Finished, Type Start Then Enter To Go Back To Start Page
“G:\Documents and Settings\alice\Desktop\MoparScape_org - Index.htm”
SET /p option=Go Back To Start?
if %option%==start goto start
CLS

item.title: How i get Mod Taharoks Ultimate Compiler?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

You do not need it, Mod taharoks is not a compiler.

You already have a compiler if you downloaded java jdk.
